verses.verse: In the twelfth<WH8147> <WH6240> year<WH8141> of Ahaz<WH271> king<WH4428> of Judah,<WH3063> Hoshea<WH1954> the son<WH1121> of Elah<WH425> became<WH4427> king<WH4427> over<WH5921> Israel<WH3478> in Samaria,<WH8111> [and reigned] nine<WH8672> years.<WH8141>
And he did<WH6213> evil<WH7451> in the sight<WH5869> of the Lord,<WH3068> only<WH7534> not as the kings<WH4428> of Israel<WH3478> who<WH834> were before<WH6440> him.
Shalmaneser<WH8022> king<WH4428> of Assyria<WH804> came<WH5927> up against<WH5921> him, and Hoshea<WH1954> became<WH1961> his servant<WH5650> and paid<WH7725> him tribute.<WH4503>

But the king<WH4428> of Assyria<WH804> found<WH4672> conspiracy<WH7195> in Hoshea,<WH1954> who<WH834> had sent<WH7971> messengers<WH4397> to So<WH5471> king<WH4428> of Egypt<WH4714> and had offered<WH5927> no<WH3808> tribute<WH4503> to the king<WH4428> of Assyria,<WH804> as [he had done] year<WH8141> by year;<WH8141> so the king<WH4428> of Assyria<WH804> shut<WH6113> him up and bound<WH631> him in prison.<WH1004> <WH3608>
Then the king<WH4428> of Assyria<WH804> invaded<WH5927> the whole<WH3605> land<WH776> and went<WH5927> up to Samaria<WH8111> and besieged<WH6696> <WH5921> it three<WH7969> years.<WH8141>

In the ninth<WH8671> year<WH8141> of Hoshea,<WH1954> the king<WH4428> of Assyria<WH804> captured<WH3920> Samaria<WH8111> and carried<WH1540> Israel<WH3478> away<WH1540> into exile<WH1540> to Assyria,<WH804> and settled<WH3427> them in Halah<WH2477> and Habor,<WH2249> [on] the river<WH5104> of Gozan,<WH1470> and in the cities<WH5892> of the Medes.<WH4074>

Now [this] came<WH1961> about, because<WH3588> the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> had sinned<WH2398> against the Lord<WH3068> their God,<WH430> who had brought<WH5927> them up from the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> from under<WH8478> the hand<WH3027> of Pharaoh,<WH6547> king<WH4428> of Egypt,<WH4714> and they had feared<WH3372> other<WH312> gods<WH430>

and walked<WH1980> in the customs<WH2708> of the nations<WH1471> whom<WH834> the Lord<WH3068> had driven<WH3423> out before<WH4480> <WH6440> the sons<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and [in the customs] of the kings<WH4428> of Israel<WH3478> which<WH834> they had introduced.<WH6213>

And the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> did<WH2644> things<WH1697> secretly<WH2644> which<WH834> were not right,<WH9210> against<WH5921> the Lord<WH3068> their God.<WH430> Moreover, they built<WH1129> for themselves high<WH1116> places<WH1116> in all<WH3605> their towns,<WH5892> from watchtower<WH4026> <WH5341> to fortified<WH4013> city.<WH5892>
And they set<WH5324> for themselves [sacred] pillars<WH4676> and Asherim<WH842> on every<WH3605> high<WH1364> hill<WH1389> and under<WH8478> every<WH3605> green<WH7488> tree,<WH6086>

and there<WH8033> they burned<WH6999> incense<WH6999> on all<WH3605> the high<WH1116> places<WH1116> as the nations<WH1471> [did<WH6213>] which<WH834> the Lord<WH3068> had carried<WH1540> away<WH1540> to exile<WH1540> before<WH4480> <WH6440> them; and they did evil<WH7451> things<WH1697> provoking<WH3707> the Lord.<WH3068>
And they served<WH5647> idols,<WH1544> concerning which<WH834> the Lord<WH3068> had said<WH559> to them, "You shall not do<WH6213> this<WH2088> thing.<WH1697>"

Yet the Lord<WH3068> warned<WH5749> Israel<WH3478> and Judah,<WH3063> through<WH3027> all<WH3605> His prophets<WH5030> [and] every<WH3605> seer,<WH2374> saying,<WH559> "Turn<WH7725> from your evil<WH7451> ways<WH1870> and keep<WH8104> My commandments,<WH4687> My statutes<WH2708> according to all<WH3605> the law<WH8451> which<WH834> I commanded<WH6680> your fathers, and which<WH1> I sent<WH834> to you through<WH7971> My servants<WH3027> the prophets.<WH5650>"
However, they did not listen,<WH8085> but stiffened<WH7185> their neck<WH6203> like their fathers, who<WH1> did not believe<WH834> in the Lord<WH539> their God.<WH3068>

And they rejected<WH3988> His statutes<WH2706> and His covenant<WH1285> which<WH834> He made<WH3772> with their fathers, and His warnings<WH1> with which<WH5715> He warned<WH834> them. And they followed<WH5749> <WH1980> vanity<WH310> and became<WH1892> vain,<WH1891> and [went] after<WH1891> the nations<WH310> which<WH1471> surrounded<WH834> them, concerning which<WH5439> the Lord<WH834> had commanded<WH3068> them not to do<WH6680> like them.

And they forsook<WH5800> all<WH3605> the commandments<WH4687> of the Lord<WH3068> their God<WH430> and made<WH6213> for themselves molten<WH4541> images,<WH4541> [even] two<WH8147> calves,<WH5695> and made<WH6213> an Asherah<WH842> and worshiped<WH7812> all<WH3605> the host<WH6635> of heaven<WH8064> and served<WH5647> Baal.<WH1168>

Then they made their sons<WH1121> and their daughters<WH1323> pass<WH5674> through the fire,<WH784> and practiced<WH7080> divination<WH7081> and enchantments,<WH5172> and sold<WH4376> themselves to do<WH6213> evil<WH7451> in the sight<WH5869> of the Lord,<WH3068> provoking<WH3707> Him.

So the Lord<WH3068> was very<WH3966> angry<WH599> with Israel,<WH3478> and removed<WH5493> them from His sight;<WH6440> none<WH3808> was left<WH7604> except<WH7534> <WH905> the tribe<WH7626> of Judah.<WH3063>

Also<WH1571> Judah<WH3063> did not keep<WH8104> the commandments<WH4687> of the Lord<WH3068> their God,<WH430> but walked<WH1980> in the customs<WH2708> which<WH834> Israel<WH3478> had introduced.<WH6213>

And the Lord<WH3068> rejected<WH3988> all<WH3605> the descendants<WH2233> of Israel<WH3478> and afflicted<WH6031> them and gave<WH5414> them into the hand<WH3027> of plunderers,<WH8154> until<WH5704> <WH834> He had cast<WH7993> them out of His sight.<WH6440>

When<WH3588> He had torn<WH7167> Israel<WH3478> from the house<WH1004> of David,<WH1732> they made<WH4427> Jeroboam<WH3379> the son<WH1121> of Nebat<WH5028> king.<WH4427> Then Jeroboam<WH3379> drove<WH9312> Israel<WH3478> away<WH9312> from following<WH310> the Lord,<WH3068> and made them commit<WH2398> a great<WH1419> sin.<WH2401>
And the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> walked<WH1980> in all<WH3605> the sins<WH9128> of Jeroboam<WH3379> which<WH834> he did;<WH6213> they did not depart<WH5493> from them,

until<WH5704> <WH834> the Lord<WH3068> removed<WH5493> Israel<WH3478> from His sight,<WH6440> as He spoke<WH1696> through<WH3027> all<WH3605> His servants<WH5650> the prophets.<WH5030> So Israel<WH3478> was carried<WH1540> away<WH1540> into exile<WH1540> from their own land<WH127> to Assyria<WH804> until<WH5704> this<WH2088> day.<WH3117>

And the king<WH4428> of Assyria<WH804> brought<WH935> [men] from Babylon<WH894> and from Cuthah<WH3575> and from Avva<WH5755> and from Hamath<WH2574> and Sephar-vaim, and settled<WH3427> [them] in the cities<WH5892> of Samaria<WH8111> in place<WH8478> of the sons<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478> So they possessed<WH3423> Samaria<WH8111> and lived<WH3427> in its cities.<WH5892>

And it came<WH1961> about at the beginning<WH8462> of their living<WH3427> there,<WH8033> that they did not fear<WH3372> the Lord;<WH3068> therefore the Lord<WH3068> sent<WH7971> lions<WH738> among them which killed<WH2026> some of them.

So they spoke<WH559> to the king<WH4428> of Assyria,<WH804> saying,<WH559> "The nations<WH1471> whom<WH834> you have carried<WH1540> away<WH1540> into exile<WH1540> in the cities<WH5892> of Samaria<WH8111> do not know<WH3045> the custom<WH4941> of the god<WH430> of the land;<WH776> so he has sent<WH7971> lions<WH738> among them, and behold,<WH2009> they kill<WH4191> them because<WH834> they do not know<WH3045> the custom<WH4941> of the god<WH430> of the land.<WH776>"

Then the king<WH4428> of Assyria<WH804> commanded,<WH6680> saying,<WH559> "Take<WH1980> there<WH8033> one<WH259> of the priests<WH3548> whom<WH834> you carried<WH1540> away<WH1540> into exile,<WH1540> and let him go<WH1980> and live<WH3427> there;<WH8033> and let him teach<WH3384> them the custom<WH4941> of the god<WH430> of the land.<WH776>"

So one<WH259> of the priests<WH3548> whom<WH834> they had carried<WH1540> away<WH1540> into exile<WH1540> from Samaria<WH8111> came<WH935> and lived<WH3427> at Bethel,<WH1008> and taught<WH3384> them how<WH349> they should fear<WH3372> the Lord.<WH3068>

But every<WH1471> nation<WH1471> still made<WH6213> gods<WH430> of its own and put<WH5117> them in the houses<WH1004> of the high<WH1116> places<WH1116> which<WH834> the people<WH8118> of Samaria<WH8118> had made,<WH6213> every<WH1471> nation<WH1471> in their cities<WH5892> in which<WH834> they lived.<WH3427>
And the men<WH376> of Babylon<WH894> made<WH6213> Succoth-benoth, the men<WH376> of Cuth<WH3575> made<WH6213> Nergal,<WH5370> the men<WH376> of Hamath<WH2574> made<WH6213> Ashima,<WH807>

and the Avvites<WH5757> made<WH6213> Nibhaz<WH5026> and Tartak;<WH8662> and the Sepharvites<WH5616> burned<WH8313> their children<WH1121> in the fire<WH784> to Adrammelech<WH152> and Anammelech<WH6048> the gods<WH430> of Sepharvaim.<WH5617>

They also feared<WH3372> the Lord<WH3068> and appointed<WH6213> from among<WH7098> themselves priests<WH3548> of the high<WH1116> places,<WH1116> who acted<WH6213> for them in the houses<WH1004> of the high<WH1116> places.<WH1116>

They feared<WH3372> the Lord<WH3068> and served<WH5647> their own gods<WH430> according to the custom<WH4941> of the nations<WH1471> from among whom<WH834> they had been carried<WH1540> away<WH1540> into exile.<WH1540>

To this<WH2088> day<WH3117> they do<WH6213> according to the earlier<WH7223> customs:<WH4941> they do not fear<WH3372> the Lord,<WH3068> nor<WH369> do they follow<WH6213> their statutes<WH2708> or their ordinances<WH4941> or the law,<WH8451> or the commandments<WH4687> which<WH834> the Lord<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> the sons<WH1121> of Jacob,<WH3290> whom<WH834> He named<WH7760> <WH8034> Israel;<WH3478>

with whom the Lord<WH3068> made<WH3772> a covenant<WH1285> and commanded<WH6680> them, saying,<WH559> "You shall not fear<WH3372> other<WH312> gods,<WH430> nor<WH3808> bow<WH7812> down<WH7812> yourselves to them nor<WH3808> serve<WH5647> them nor<WH3808> sacrifice<WH2076> to them.

"But the Lord,<WH3068> who<WH834> brought<WH5927> you up from the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> with great<WH1419> power<WH3581> and with an outstretched<WH5186> arm,<WH2220> Him you shall fear,<WH3372> and to Him you shall bow<WH7812> yourselves down,<WH7812> and to Him you shall sacrifice.<WH2076>

"And the statutes<WH2706> and the ordinances<WH4941> and the law<WH8451> and the commandment,<WH4687> which<WH834> He wrote<WH3789> for you, you shall observe<WH8104> to do<WH6213> forever<WH3605>;<WH3117> and you shall not fear<WH3372> other<WH312> gods.<WH430>
"And the covenant<WH1285> that I have made<WH3772> with you, you shall not forget,<WH7911> nor<WH3808> shall you fear<WH3372> other<WH312> gods.<WH430>
"But the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> you shall fear;<WH3372> and He will deliver<WH5337> you from the hand<WH3027> of all<WH3605> your enemies.<WH340>"
However, they did not listen,<WH8085> but they did<WH6213> according to their earlier<WH7223> custom.<WH4941>

So while these<WH428> nations<WH1471> feared<WH3372> the Lord,<WH3068> they also served<WH5647> their idols;<WH6456> their children<WH1121> likewise<WH1571> and their grandchildren,<WH1121> as their fathers did,<WH1> so they do<WH6213> to this<WH6213> day.<WH2088>
